channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Fall 2024 Student Course Evaluations Now Open
item.description: Date: Monday, November 25, 2024 (all day) - Course evaluations for the Fall 2024 semester will open on Monday, November 25 and remain available through Wednesday, December 11. Your feedback is very important to the Institute, the five schools, and their departments, so please be sure to complete evaluation surveys for all your courses!
item.author: Students

item.title: Applications Now Being Accepted for Arch and Fall 2025 Resident Assistants
item.description: Student Living and Learning is looking for applicants to join their Arch 2025 and Fall 2025 staff, so apply between now and January 31, 2025 to join their team of leaders on campus and help create a community in your residence hall! Qualified applicants will be required to attend both a group and individual interview in October. To learn more, sign up to attend an information session.
item.author: Students

item.title: Rensselaer, Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai to Offer Joint Ph.D. Program in Health Sciences Engineering
item.description: Beginning in the fall semester of 2025, Rensselaer and the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai will offer a joint Ph.D. program in health sciences engineering that will focus on reparative and regenerative medicine, immunoengineering, and neuroengineering.
item.author: Community

item.title: Mueller Center to Host Thanksgiving Dinner During Break
item.description: Date: Thursday, November 28, 2024 11:30 AM - 2:00 PM - If you’ll be staying on campus this Thanksgiving Break, you’re invited to join the Mueller Center for its annual Thanksgiving Dinner in the Union McNeil Room! Please register in advance to ensure there will be enough food for all; contact Donna Sutton if you have any questions.
item.author: Community

item.title: Bid on a One-of-a-Kind Model of the Original Chicago Ferris Wheel!
item.description: You can own a one-of-a-kind model of the original Chicago Ferris Wheel! The model can be viewed in the Folsom Library, and bidding ends on Monday, December 2 at 11:11am ET, with all proceeds to benefit the United Way. Please visit the United Way Silent Auction page for bidding rules, and to scan the QR code to place your bid. Bid high, bid often!
item.author: Community

item.title: Fidelity to Offer Confidential In-Person Retirement Consultation Sessions December 9
item.description: Date: Monday, December 9, 2024 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM - Schedule a confidential consultation to help you become better informed and more confident about your workplace retirement savings plan benefits!
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: 2024 United Way Pledge Campaign Now Open
item.description: Date: Friday, October 18, 2024 12:00 AM - Mon , December 16, 2024 12:00 AM - The United Way of the Greater Capital Region works to advance the common good by focusing on basic needs, family support and financial stability, and Rensselaer has long been an active and proud partner in helping to create long-lasting systemic change toward a better tomorrow. Once again, Rensselaer’s United Way volunteers call upon the generosity of the campus community to help address societal challenges.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: United Way Holiday Wreath, Poinsettia Sale Open Through November 26
item.description:
Date: Thursday, November 7, 2024 11:00 AM - Tue , November 26, 2024 11:00 AM - The annual United Way Holiday Wreath and Poinsettia pre-order sale is now open through Tuesday, November 26! You must submit your order form with payment by Tuesday, November 26; pickup will be during the Armory’s community fair/supplier showcase between the hours of 11 a.m. and 2 p.m. on Thursday, December 5.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
